Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On July 25, 2022, JPMorgan Chase & Co. closed public offerings of $3,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2028 and $3,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2033 (collectively, the “Notes”). The Notes were registered under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, pursuant to a registration statement on Form S-3(File No. 333-263304),as amended. In connection with these offerings, the legal opinion as to the legality of the Notes is being filed as Exhibit 5.1 to this report.
